title: You’ve made your legal declaration
paragraph1: When all executors have made their legal declaration, {leadExecFullName} will complete the application and send all the relevant documents to the probate registry.
paragraph2: {leadExecFullName} will receive the grant of probate within 20 working days of the probate registry receiving all the necessary paperwork.
paragraph3: Contact {leadExecFullName} if you need more information.
paragraph4b: your feedback will help us to improve it (opens in a new window)
